TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
Stop right there.

No more of this roleplaying nonsense please. All it does is adds posts to the thread length without contributing to any kind of discussion.

Stop right there.

No more of this roleplaying nonsense please. All it does is adds posts to the thread length without contributing to any kind of discussion.

Could you give us a topic please?

Okay.

@roflcopter

You may be a God, but you are a powerless one.

Could you give us a topic please?

Anyone here familiar with engineering? Like real world designing and building machinery or vehicles?
Send me a PM if you want to continue this chat of the gods. We can't risk precious posts here, as more and more risk it to die.

Anyone here familiar with engineering? Like real world designing and building machinery or vehicles?

This basically sums up my thoughts on this.
It sounds like you lack respect.

It sounds like you lack respect.

*bows down*

All hail the god empress!

THANK YOU, ODIN! You are a worthy god!

I'm somewhat knowledgeable about engineering. I built a vacuumpump for the the lab out of the spare parts for three others last month, for example.
I've created blueprints of a hybrid engine prototype, but I don't really want to share

Spent the day today wiring a machine up. It was working for over a year, but it was decided to rearrange its work area to improve safety and visibility as well as make it easier to maintain.

So lots of little wires to hook back up, and then I have to start in on the plumbing.
I looked at the petition thread, I post my true response here...
I made blueprints of very nice buildings ,and game ideas ,but I'm not the one that really likes to share designs.

My best designs are not for public viewing either.

But some stuff I'll show off, mostly those that I'll never be able to do anything with.

I also learned how to design a Steam engine with any help ,but thinking things through.Also, I have the ability to destroy Items (usually anything) whit my bare hands ,and creativeness in less than 30 seconds give ,or take.

Am I the only one who thinks that buying a truck (when i learn how to drive) ,and attack a large barrel .Then, Mechanize it so that it can make cider ,or other drinks so you can sell it.

I looked at the petition thread, I post my true response here...

I see your facepalm and raise you a massive, memetic, synchronized facepalm!

Anyone here familiar with engineering? Like real world designing and building machinery or vehicles?

Me? Hell no. But I do like thinking about what would happen if weight was applied to different shapes of different materials. I read somewhere a Triangle was one of the strongest shapes so I just started doing "simulations" in my mind when I was bored. Kinda stuck with me.

Me? Hell no. But I do like thinking about what would happen if weight was applied to different shapes of different materials. I read somewhere a Triangle was one of the strongest shapes so I just started doing "simulations" in my mind when I was bored. Kinda stuck with me.

Oh I know how you feel,but it is more of time simulation with certain things removed or added.

Oh I know how you feel,but it is more of time simulation with certain things removed or added.

Such is the basis of bridge simulation software. It's all about what part of the truss experiences what force, in order to create the most efficient design with the least material used.
